Posts.Content: If your mother is still alive, and in any condition that she might be in, I think I know how to save her. THIS IS A MUST READ POST!!! it could be the difference between life and death. Type "Budwig" in to Google, and read about her natural cure to cancer. It sounds rediculous, but has cured many people. She is Germany's most renouned scientist, and has been nominated for 6 nobel prizes. Her cure is a diet of cottage cheese and flax oil. Please read this. Thank you
Posts.Title: Found out today that my mum has breast cancer

Posts.Content: if it's cancer, you don't have to worry, because I know an almost definate cure. It was formed naturally by Doctor Johanna Budwig, and it's based on flaxseed oil and cottage cheese. Follow her instructions to the letter, and you will be ok.

Posts.Title: Found out today that my mum has breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi This may sound really unbelievable, but I know a natural cure for most cancer: Lindseed or flaxseed oil mixed very well with cottage cheese or yogurt. It is the work of Germany's best biologist, Johanna Budwig, who lived to be 95 years old. If you would like to read about this to give your loved one a chance at a longer life on this earth, please type in "Budwig" into Google, and read about it. Start him/her on this diet that Budwig reccomends, and they will most likely live. Please try this. It could be the difference between life and death. Thank you
Posts.Title: dying from cancer - what should we expect?

Posts.Content: Hi, I am 14 too, and I know what you might be going through, scince my friends aunt just died of breast cancer. you should definetly see a doctor, but if you want to know a recently discovered, but not patented cure for cancer, type "Budwig" into google, and read about her cure for cancer. I personally know two people who have been sent home by doctors who told them they had no hope, went on this diet, and recovered. It is inexpensive, and natural, consisting of cottage cheese and flax oil. please try it or spread the word to everybody you know. Thank you
Posts.Title: think i might have breast cancer.

Posts.Content: I wanted to spread this cure for cancer to everybody I could reach. Doctor Johanna Budwig, Germany's most renouned biologist discovered it, but didn't patent it. Budwig has been nominated for 6 nobel prizes during her lifetime. If you have cancer, or know someone with cancer, please tell them to type "Budwig" Into google, click on the first link, and read about her cancer curing diet. It is formed around flaxseed oil and cottage cheese. I personally know 2 people who were diagnosed hopeless and sent home from the hospital to die in peace, and they both went on this diet and survived thier cancer. The cancer never came back, because they stayed on this curing and preventitive diet. So If you could, please read about this and spread it to as many people as possible, as it may be the difference between life and death for many. Thank you
Posts.Title: Natural Cure for/prevention of cancer

Posts.Content: Because Doctor budwig didn't patent it, and people weren't interested in it because it wouldn't make them any money, because the ingredients are good the way they are in their natural form. Read about it before you critisize. I didn't believe it at first either.
